original_text: And they came to Bethsaida. And some people brought to him a blind man and begged him to touch him.
korean_text: 벳새다에 이르매 사람들이 맹인 한 사람을 데리고 예수께 나아와 손 대시기를 구하거늘

sentences.original_text: And some people brought to him a blind man
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어떤 사람들이 그에게 한 맹인을 데려왔고

sentences.original_text: and begged him to touch him.
